ivardefs.name: code
ivardefs.desc: The code that identifies this filter when it is used as a filter in [ValueSet](valueset.html#).compose.include.filter.

ivardefs.name: description
ivardefs.desc: A description of how or why the filter is used.

ivardefs.name: operator_
ivardefs.desc: A list of operators that can be used with the filter.

ivardefs.name: value
ivardefs.desc: A description of what the value for the filter should be.

properties.desc: A filter that can be used in a value set compose statement when selecting concepts using a filter.
